title: Even After Repair - More than Half My Matches force me to the "Reconnect" screen upon launch.
body:
I have been having an issue with a lot of my games not launching properly. My laptop doesn't have this issue on the same internet connection, so it's not the internet. 

But most of my games now force me to the launcher, and sometimes won't let me reconnect to the point where the match gets remade?

replies.body: If you're disconnecting during the match, then there might be some instability with your network struggling to communicate with the game server.  A repair wouldn't really do a lot in this case, as that focuses more on game files and not connection.  My suggestion would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

As far as I am conerned it's a client based issue and doesn't seem to get a fix but, I can reconnect after everyone have connected and spawned. It is usually just me spamming the reconnect button for a minute or 2...
Absolutely none of  my games are launching properly.  This is an issue affecting well over a quarter of the community and Riot doesn't seem to give a damn so far...
